attributes.action: realise that the war in iraq was illegal and should apologise for the murder of inocent seeds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
our fabricated media system is there to blind the taxpayer of the truth,  if you have opened thihs petition it shows that it is true but wll anyone ever pay attention to these words, i doubt it. Blair is a money hungry murderer, along with most of the labour party.
 Freedom of speach is no longer noticed so lets try freedom of action.  give them an inch, the take a yard, give them a yard, they take a mile, once a man and twice a child it seems total destruction is there only solution. Listen to these words of Bob Marley

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
